com.vsegouin.mowitnow.mower.core.map

Class MapArea

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vsegouin.mowitnow.mower.core.map.MapArea

  • public class MapArea
extends Object
    Created by v.segouin on 07/09/2016. This class represents the area's map to be mowed

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapArea(int abscissa, int ordinate)
      The basic constructor, will create a matrix corresponding to the max abscissa and ordinate given.

      • MapArea

        public MapArea(int abscissa,
               int ordinate)
        The basic constructor, will create a matrix corresponding to the max abscissa and ordinate given.
        Parameters:
        abscissa - the width of the matrix
        ordinate - the height of the matrix
